targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_voltage_2\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/load_percentage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "SOC" 
FROM "state"
WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/state_of_charge/state'
  AND $timeFilter

SELECT last("value") AS "LoadPower" 
FROM "state"
WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/load_power/state'
  AND $timeFilter

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Load Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/load_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Grid Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/grid_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/pv_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Voltage" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_voltage_1\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Current" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_current_1\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Voltage" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_voltage_2\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Current" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_current_2\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

alert.message: No data for more than 1 minute
alert.name: No Data Alert

targets.query: SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_power\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_power\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_power\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Load Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /^solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d\/auxiliary_pv_power\/state$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Voltage" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_voltage_\d+\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/load_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/load_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/grid_voltage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/grid_voltage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/ac_output_voltage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Total" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/ac_output_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/load_power_essential\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/load_power_non-essential\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/generator_power\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") AS "Battery Temperature" FROM "state" WHERE "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/temperature\/state/ ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("value") AS "Battery Temperature Env" FROM "state" WHERE "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/temperature_env\/state/ ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT last("value") 
FROM "state"
WHERE "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/temperature\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/battery_current\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") AS "Total" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/battery_current/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter Cycles" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/cycles\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Battery Cell Voltage Lowest" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/cell_voltage_-_lowest\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Battery Cell Voltage Highest" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/cell_voltage_-_highest\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Battery Voltage"
FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/battery_voltage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Battery state of charge" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/state_of_charge\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Battery Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/battery_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 0 FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
list.label: Retention Policy
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
